snippet: The man, Yeudi Estrada, was dead when he arrived at Police Headquarters in the resort of Playa del Carmen after his arrest, local prosecutors said.
abstract: Mexican authorities say six police officers have been arrested in connection with the death of Yeudi Estrada, United States citizen who was in their custody near the beach resort of Cancun.
lead_paragraph: The man, Yeudi Estrada, was dead when he arrived at Police Headquarters in the resort of Playa del Carmen after his arrest, local prosecutors said.

headline.main: Mexico: 6 Police Officers Charged in Death of U.S. Citizen in Custody
headline.print_headline: Mexico: 6 Police Officers Charged In Death of U.S. Citizen in Custody
